lyric:
[00:04.41]Facing forward
[00:07.44]Lights out
[00:09.12]I won't stop running
[00:10.70]Falling backwards
[00:13.90]Hands tied
[00:15.51]I won't stop running
[00:17.31]I'll take another sunrise
[00:20.68]Another hand to hold tight
[00:23.16]This isn't over
[00:27.05]I am way too young and I won't stop runnin
[00:34.96]I won't stop runnin
[00:39.91]I am way too young and I won't stop runnin
[00:47.35]I don't know how much longer I can fake it
[00:49.96]That it's all alright, that I can do this alone
[00:53.64]And I know that life is what you make it
[00:56.12]But it's hard to see stars when you're always caught in the folds
[01:00.69]Every night in my mind it's a fight
[01:02.83]But I won't stop dreaming
[01:05.74]'Cause this isn't over
[01:09.01]It's never over
[01:13.23]Facing forward
[01:16.46]Lights out
[01:18.00]I won't stop running
[01:19.75]Falling backwards
[01:23.01]Hands tied
[01:24.64]I won't stop running
[01:26.75]I'll take another sunrise
[01:29.72]Another hand to hold tight
[01:31.97]This isn't over
[01:35.99]I am way too young and I won't stop running
[01:40.09]I'd rather be the one that starts the fire
[01:42.58]Than to shut my mouth and be the one who gets burned
[01:46.29]Yeah "it is what it is," but I wanna go higher
[01:48.74]'Cause I felt it once before
[01:51.34]I believe the tables will turn
[01:52.86]I wanna love and be the one who is loved
[01:55.49]No I won't stop dreaming
[01:57.45]'Cause this isn't over
[02:01.49]It's never over
[02:05.72]Facing forward
[02:09.03]Lights out
[02:10.53]I won't stop running
[02:12.32]Falling backwards
[02:15.57]Hands tied
[02:17.07]I won't stop running
[02:19.45]I'll take another sunrise
[02:22.20]Another hand to hold tight
[02:24.49]This isn't over
[02:28.13]I am way too young and I won't stop running
[02:33.15]How do you explain it?
[02:34.65]For seven years I made it through the falls
[02:38.16]I'm living it all
[02:40.94]Living it all
[02:45.31]I'm tearing off the labels
[02:47.63]And suddenly I'm able, scaling walls
[02:50.99]I'm living it all
[02:54.53]Living it all
[02:56.94]And I won't stop running
[03:03.40]I won't stop running
[03:07.99]I am way too young and I won't stop runnin
[03:11.41]Facing forward
[03:14.76]Lights out
[03:16.32]I won't stop running
[03:18.08]Falling backwards
[03:21.38]Hands tied
[03:22.85]I won't stop running
[03:24.83]I'll take another sunrise
[03:28.00]Another hand to hold tight
[03:30.43]This isn't over
[03:33.67]This isn't over
[03:37.03]This isn't over
[03:40.69]I am way too young and I won't stop running
tlyric:
[by:Royal妖耳]
[00:04.41]直面向前
[00:07.44]灯光熄灭
[00:09.12]我不会停止奔跑
[00:10.70]跌倒滞后
[00:13.90]握紧双手
[00:15.51]我不会停止奔跑
[00:17.31]我要抓住另一个日出
[00:20.68]握紧另一只手
[00:23.16]还没有结束
[00:27.05]我还很年轻，我不会停止奔跑
[00:34.96]我不会停止奔跑
[00:39.91]我还很年轻，我不会停止奔跑
[00:47.35]我不知道可以假装多久
[00:49.96]假装这是完全正确的，假装我可以独自做到
[00:53.64]我也知道生活要用心造
[00:56.12]但是当你总是受挫，你很难看见星光
[01:00.69]每个夜晚都内心挣扎
[01:02.83]但是我不会停止梦想
[01:05.74]因为还没有结束
[01:09.01]永远不气馁

[01:52.86]我想要爱也被人爱着
